question.text: Javascript is a client side scripting language.
What does the expression Math.floor(2.86) evaluate to?
What does the expression (87 == "87") evaluate to?
Which of the following is a valid function definition?
Which of the following methods can be used to bind events to an element object?
Consider we draw a rectangle using a canvas context object: context.fillRect(5,5,100,75). What is the position of the top left corner in terms of (x,y)?
